title: The Green Beet
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Western, Fast food, Take-out
description: U of T's first exclusively vegetarian cafe, open Sept 2014 in the Gerstein Science Information Centre. Offers a variety of soups, sandwiches, salads, hot entrees, grab-and-go items, and sweet treats. Sources local produce and operates a recycling and composting system to minimize waste. Students with UeaT meal plans can use their flex dollars here.
